about_the_game:
Arcadium is a roguelite shooter set in a dynamically generated universe. Journey across space, harvest planetary resources, and craft powerful builds to eradicate relentless waves of aliens. Each playthrough unveils a new and uncharted universe, ensuring endless challenges and discoveries.

Explore through a procedurally generated universe

As a new universe full of new discoveries is being generated for each round, you'll never run out of challenges to conquer! Utilize the intervals between enemy waves to harvest resources from nearby planets, preparing for the battles ahead.


Fight colorful waves of aliens

Encounter diverse alien species as you explore the universe. Master your movement, shooting, and skills to overcome these formidable foes.


Build your way to the victory

The selection of your spaceship and the strategic incorporation of artifacts, talents and items allow for an extensive range of customized builds. The game offers countless possibilities, enabling you to dictate your playstyle to ensure a unique and engaging experience with every session.



Key Features

  • A procedurally generated universe that offers limitless exploration with planets, stars, black holes, aliens and wonders to discover, setting it apart from traditional static or repetitive maps;
  • Hundreds of different abilities obtainable through talents, items, artifacts, and more;
  • While the game showcases twin-stick shooter mechanics, it also offers an automatic aiming and shooting option.
  • Strategic gameplay with intervals between enemy waves, giving you the chance to harvest resources from nearby planets and prepare for the next wave of enemies;
  • Quick play sessions. Also, continue from where you left off;
  • And more!
